name: Krista Nylen
blurb: Krista Nylen is a writer, creator, marketer, and understander of people. She, like her characters, is questioning, self-deprecating, and hopefully clever. This story is based on her journey to find her place as a woman in business and tech.

name: Michelle Cutolo
blurb: Michelle is an award-winning NY/LA based director. She has a decisive creative approach in the clever, funny and creative worlds with a focus on elevating female-centric comedic ventures.
